channel.title: Comments on: WoW Patch 1.9 renamed “Can I Get a Hallelujah?”

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: It's about time they did something to boost shamans.
item.content:encoded: It’s about time they did something to boost shamans.

item.title: By: Me
item.dc:creator: Me
item.description: In patch 1.9, Shaman will no longer take damage, suffer no cooldowns, spells all cost 0 mana, they crit 100% of the time, 300% movement speed, breathe underwater, get x500% selling price at vendors, get a free epic mount at lvl 10, can craft epic weapons and armour with no mats at lvl 20 (BOE), can res the whole party with full health and mana (instant cast - no cooldown), and can boot GMs off the server (instant cast - no cooldown)
item.content:encoded: In patch 1.9, Shaman will no longer take damage, suffer no cooldowns, spells all cost 0 mana, they crit 100% of the time, 300% movement speed, breathe underwater, get x500% selling price at vendors, get a free epic mount at lvl 10, can craft epic weapons and armour with no mats at lvl 20 (BOE), can res the whole party with full health and mana (instant cast – no cooldown), and can boot GMs off the server (instant cast – no cooldown)

item.title: By: Darniaq
item.dc:creator: Darniaq
item.description:
Yea, that's nice and all, but really, can anything beat Mages finally getting to conjure 10 Crystal Waters as of 1.9?!
;)
item.content:encoded:
Yea, that’s nice and all, but really, can anything beat Mages finally getting to conjure 10 Crystal Waters as of 1.9?!

ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: drypulse
item.dc:creator: drypulse
item.description: this is definitely one of the most needed changes for paladins... i'm glad they realised that 5 mins was a fuckin joke and changed it to 15. that alone would have been great, but to also add the cast across the whole class option, thats just awesome.
item.content:encoded: this is definitely one of the most needed changes for paladins… i’m glad they realised that 5 mins was a fuckin joke and changed it to 15. that alone would have been great, but to also add the cast across the whole class option, thats just awesome.
